data.text: @P_Charles_ID_Dr Thank you for this important data. The longitudinal studies will serve us even more.

@P_Charles_ID_Dr The long term plan should have been to not let Covid rip. The politicians said it’s necessary for everyone to get Covid. Perhaps we need to educate these politicians on the importance of the effects of Covid and our long term health.

@P_Charles_ID_Dr Previous #COVID19 now an absolutely essential part of history taking for Every patient seen in general practice. 
For so many reasons.
@P_Charles_ID_Dr Thank you for sharing. I’m shocked there is so little said about this.
@NjbBari3 @P_Charles_ID_Dr Long-term disability, even if small, at population scale is going to be horrendous. Complete policy failure, and wilful denial considering Danish and UK official stats.
@anaestricks Not routine. COVID teams generally too busy to worry about longer term things like CVS RFs

@P_Charles_ID_Dr @CdrHBiscuitIII Yup, agree. We are all saying this. 

Even mild COVID-19 is no good. Post vax data to come, but we still have plenty of people with symptoms, or were infected pre vax to risk stratify.
@P_Charles_ID_Dr Is aspirin being prescribed for these risks post covid?
@P_Charles_ID_Dr Is there a role for a #clinicaltrial of temporary/short-term cardioprotective interventions post-#COVID? 3 months of statin? B-blocker? Aspirin? etc? @SverdlovAaron
